column3:
Open Letter to International Community

Sirs:::
We want to use this opportunity::: to first of all commend the International community::: for its efforts to criticize Nigerian Fulani Government actions against Biafran agitators::: and other oppressed people in the country.

Nigerian successive Governments::: have been committing all manner of atrocities and suppression of people of Biafra::: since the so-called independence about sixty years ago. The systematic genocide::: slavery::: and inhuman treatment::: meted out to our people have surpassed those of any oppressed group of people in the world. Hence::: we have been agitating for self-determinat
ion::: which has spanned more than 54 years.

The Nigeria-Biafra civil war which lasted for 30 months ended in January 1970. Successive Hausa/Fulani regimes have continued to repress and exclude our people in the scheme of things. Their wickedness and incessant killing of our people::: have revived our resolve for restoration of State of Biafra. That is the only way out of this internal slavery and local imperialism. We are not compatible at all with our oppressors; to warrant living together in one country.

Now::: we beseech the world bodies including United Nations and United States of America::: not to supply weapons to Nigerian Authorities::: under any pretence. Do not send money or any material help to them either; ostensibly to fight terrorism. Most of the ammunition and cash donations::: end up in the hands of terrorists they themselves sponsor. Many of the successful ambushes laid against soldiers::: and capture of military equipments and money::: are pre-arranged. They are now paying salaries::: and housing the insurgents under fake amnesty.

Highly placed persons in Nigerian Government::: and other Northern elite::: finance the activities of: Boko Haram::: ISWAP::: bandits::: name them. This is part of the grand plan to take over Nigeria. They want to conquer::: take over lands in Biafra::: and other Southern and Middle Belt areas::: as Fulani settlements.

It is hypocritical for Nigerian Authorities::: to claim they are fighting insurgency and banditry; and at the same time indirectly arming::: and giving money running into hundreds of millions of dollars::: to those criminals. Thousands of non-Fulanis are being killed every month in the country. In Katsina and Zamfara States for example::: the Fulani bandits are massacring the Hausas on daily basis. And little or nothing is being done about it.

Terrorism and banditry in Nigeria::: can never be stopped by the supplies of weapons::: and donations from any quarter to the Government. They end up equipping and enriching those armed groups. Many of those armed gangs are on the pay roll of Nigerian Government and Northern elite. The much talked about repentant terrorists::: are being placed on jumbo salaries (as much as #100:::000 a month); far above the civil service structure::: from borrowed loans with interests accumulating. Imagine idle illiterates earning more than University professors::: lecturers::: doctors and others::: who are even owed several months of meager pay.

All those labeled repentant terrorists have never confessed their evil deeds for one day. Have they given any information on the location of heavy equipments like armoured cars they captured? Has any of those pretenders::: given insight concerning the whereabouts of multitude of adopted people::: including women and children? Why do they go back to their old lives of kidnapping and banditry? They are all scammers. They and their financers are taking the rest of the country for a ride. These miscreants are promptly absorbed into the armed forces to carry on with their jihadist agenda. Our taskmasters are desperate to make Nigeria Islamic Caliphate. Religious hypocrites.

Miyetty Allah- organization in charge of Fulani Herdsmen::: boasted that United Nations is on its side. This quickly reminds us of UN Under-Secretary
General::: who is a Fulani woman::: from Nigeria. She was allowed to resign her position as a Minister in Buhari’s cabinet; to pick up that job to protect Fulani interest there. Since her assumption of office::: UN has been very passive and adamant to atrocities and heinous crimes::: being committed by Fulani rulers and terrorists::: ravaging the country with impunity. She has never for one day::: uttered a word against the evils going on in Nigeria. We therefore call for her removal from that position::: due to her partisan stance against the rest people in the country. Despite all their atrocities::: Fulanis are not being tried and convicted of any crime. You can hardly get any Fulani in prison. He can not be detained for long. Once order comes from ‘above:::’ they will be left off the hook::: even if they killed people.

Why is it that international Community::: and World Powers including United States and Russia::: have kept quiet over the foreign impostors ruling over Nigeria since the year 2017? The hypocrisy and nonchallant attitude of these bodies::: have left much to be desired. They should carry out thorough investigation::: arrest all culprits and collaborators::: and prosecute them in world court and ICC. Why should they allow foreigners who impersonate a dead ruler to plunder the country::: and leave when they deem fit? They keep on diverting the country’s resources and money to develop neighbouring Niger Republic. They continue to borrow money from international financial institutions::: and creditor countries including China. They borrow and loot. They want to ground the country before absconding. Now::: about 91 percent of the budget is used in debt servicing_ to pay interest on loans. International Community needs to stop lending money to these people: because they part with bulk of the money: thereby plunging the country into perpetual bankruptcy.

We finally call on United Nations and its allies::: to promptly organize referendum for people of Biafra. And follow it up with declaration of sovereign state of Biafra. It is a long overdue.

Yours Sincerely
Evangelist Joseph U. Afurobi. https://
powertrumpeter.o
rg/blog2/?p=371.

You guys are crazy. Pretty much everyone who was going to get vaccinated…has been vaccinated.

We’re now at that point that the conspiracy theory nuts were saying a year ago. We’re being told to get “another” shot. Another one. Of course we are.

Now if you have been paying attention…the High Priests of Science have basically admitted that this thing is endemic. It is with us forever. Like the flu.

Does anyone remember what percentage of the nation got their flu shot every year? It was very very low.

So are we now setting things up so we can constantly have news stories coming out for the next 20 years telling us how few people are getting “this year’s” booster shot? I think we are.

I got the sickness…right before I was allowed to get the vaccine. Then I got the vaccine too.

So I’m doubly immunized. And yeah…immunity might fade…but honestly…I’m not getting another shot.

That first one burned. Bad. It was literally the most painful shot I ever got. I could still feel the soreness 3 weeks later. It took a full month for the burning sensation to go away 100%.

I may not have 100% immunity going forward from here…but as far as I am concerned…I’m “immune enough”. I’m done with shots. Done with masks. Done with distancing. Done with everything. I’m done. And clearly…most other Americans are too.

column260:
The issue is that there are risks with the vaccine and risks without::: but the differential in human cognitive terms isn't significant enough for widespread agreement. For example::: a disease that kills 30% of the infected population and a notable % of the total population would probably convince a lot more people to get a vaccine- even a harsh one - than a disease that kills less 3% of known infected people and almost 0% of the total population.

What we have here is the latter with a vaccine that makes enough people sick with side effects::: even if they're "just" a fatigue::: fever::: aches::: etc.::: that last long enough and with enough personal and economic impact to make the risk-reward paradigm a lot less attractive.

Even when someone says the chances of dying from the vaccine is X% lower than the disease::: you're already starting with a total mortality rate that rounds to 0.00%::: so saying you're 50% less likely to die than almost 0% (on a total population basis::: not individual risk basis) is not particularly moving.

Meanwhile::: the people who need the vaccine the least are the most likely to suffer side effects. It's not the elderly and infirm who get put down hard by inflammatory symptoms from the vaccine. It's the young and healthy who have the lowest probability of issues with the disease in the first place.

So there we have a problem::: too. We are asking people who need it the least to do the most suffering::: or - at minimum - to risk it.

If you don't start addressing those realities::: or at least start acknowledging them::: then you're not actually accomplishing anything but to deepen the divide.

column71:
In honor of Constitution Day (September 17th)

GEORGE WASHINGTON
Deemed the greatest man in the world by everyone
⁠
George Washington was famous for his humility::: and was revered as the "Greatest Man in the World" during his timeline according to scholars::: noblemen::: commoners::: and even the King of Britain whom he defeated in battle. He was also the most famous celebrity throughout the world causing people to line-up throughout the countryside just to see him ride past on his horse.
⁠
What the 400 British ships didn't see when they sailed into New York Harbor to defeat George Washington and his "ragtag" untrained Continental Army who were fighting for their independence from England's taxes and laws::: was Washington's faith in God and his humility ― the latter being his most noted characteristic of which people wrote about in their letters and diaries.
⁠
Even the other founding fathers agreed that George Washington was the best of them all::: a man with no formal education.
⁠
After Washington defeated King George III and his army after eight straight years of battling::: the King acknowledged Washington as being the best man in the world for turning down the opportunity to be ordained King (as many people wanted to see happen)::: and also for handing his devoted army back to the Congress which had never before then been done by a winning war General in order for him to return back to his farm and live out the rest of his life privately at his home although later::: he would be pressured to become the first President of the United States of America in order to continue spreading his noble::: wise and humbling influence.
⁠
Washington's army in theory::: should never have won the War for Independence (also called the Revolutionary War)::: but they did even though at times twenty-percent of the army went without shoes or clothing having to endure hot and freezing conditions including walking barefoot through frozen lakes::: cutting their feet on rocks::: and having only to eat "firecake" at times which is flour mixed water prepared in a kettle over fire thus causing many of them to die from starvation and disease when Washington somehow never got sick like the others did.

Over the years::: his army came to believe that Washington survived gunfire and disease because he was ordained by a higher-order like when a thick-mist appeared from nowhere blocking out everything in sight allowing the Continental army to escape an attack so they could regroup and strategize.
⁠
George Washington freed all his slaves before he died::: some of them had been inherited from his father during times when even African people were selling their poorest and least educated people under the justification that they weren’t like humans::: because they were primitive in culture and tradition.
⁠
It’s unfortunate that Washington::: and all the other good people couldn’t have afforded to purchase all the slaves and give them dignified jobs::: beautiful places to live::: and an educations like many did::: but there were about four million slaves in the end and nobody was rich enough to purchase them all::: especially after the invention of the Cotton Gin which rose America to being the producer of about three quarters of the world’s cotton.

column1:
Watch The University of Michigan Marching Band's 9/11 tribute performance during the halftime show at last night’s Michigan Football game.

Learn more about the performance: myumi.ch/ov8gl

The University of Michigan Marching Band posted a video to playlist 2021 Performances.
September 12 at 5:06 AM ·

Watch the Michigan Marching Band perform "We Remember"::: their 2021 halftime show::: on September 11::: 2021::: at Michigan Stadium.

MUSIC SELECTIONS:
Summon The Heroes - John Williams

Mambo (West Side Story) - Leonard Bernstein

New York/Empire State of Mind - Billy Joel / Angela Hunte::: Alicia Keys::: Alexander Shuckburgh::: Bert Keyes::: Janet Sewell-Ulepic::: Shawn Carter::: and Sylvia Robinson

Who Lives::: Who Dies::: Who Tells Your Story/This Land is Your Land/Stars and Stripes Forever - Lin-Manuel Miranda::: Woody Guthrie::: John Phillip Sousa

Saturday’s show pays tribute::: honors::: and celebrates the lives of those who selflessly ran towards danger to help. To honor the thousands of civilian souls who lost their lives. To celebrate the spirit::: strength::: and resiliency of our nation.

Our performance begins with Summon the Heroes::: honoring the brave Americans who rushed to the scene when duty called. Next::: we play Mambo (from West Side Story) and New York/Empire State of Mind::: an evocation of the energy::: life::: compassion::: love::: and strength of the “city that never sleeps.“ We transition to Who Lives::: Who Dies::: Who Tells Your Story::: which memorializes those who lost their lives while commemorating the unity and strength of the American people. Our performance concludes with a medley of This Land Is Your Land and Stars and Stripes Forever.

The Michigan Marching Band would like to thank Bill and Janelle Sykes for making this performance possible!

column3:
Thanks to Vaccine Mandates::: Segregation Is Making a Comeback. Once Again::: Black Americans Will Suffer Most.

With the push to get every man::: woman and child vaccinated against COVID-19::: new policies and mandates are rolling out across the country::: aiming to separate the vaccinated from the unvaccinated.

These actions squarely fit the definition of segregation. And while we watch blatant intolerance and prejudice grow against the unvaccinated::: there seems to be a denial that these new enforcements are in any way akin to the discriminatory laws of the past.
For some::: just hearing the word segregation in the context of separating the vaccinated from the unvaccinated is triggering and deemed offensive — as if the definition pertains only to the past mistreatment of Blacks.

What many people don’t realize is that these new policies and mandates::: set forth under the guise of public health::: are and will disproportionat
ely affect Black people more than any other ethnicity in this country.

Almost half the U.S. population has not received the COVID vaccine and::: according to recent data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention::: Black Americans have the lowest COVID vaccination rate of all ethnicities — only 28.4% of Blacks in the U.S. have received one dose of the vaccine and only 25.1% have received both doses.

That means 75% of Black Americans are being affected more than any other race when it comes to discrimination based upon vaccine status.
Blacks are once again being segregated::: this time based on their ability or their willingness to receive an experimental pharmaceutical.
With 75% of Black Americans now being kept out of restaurants::: entertainment and sports venues::: campuses — and even having to face unemployment — where do we draw the line on hypocrisy and call things out for exactly what they are?
Which in this case::: is blatant discrimination.
With these policies::: half the population are now second-class citizens::: and Black Americans are forced to repeat history.

THOUGHTS ON AFGHANISTAN by Unbiased America

Debates about whether former President Bush should have invaded Afghanistan to begin with are legitimate.

Debates about how Bush chose to wage that war::: leaving former President Obama a deteriorating situation while Bush got distracted by Iraq are legitimate.

Debates about how Obama chose to commit to fighting::: leaving former President Trump to inherit a perpetual stalemate are legitimate.

Debates about whether or not Trump should have engaged the Taliban in peace talks at all::: leaving President Biden to inherit the complications of that deal are legitimate.

But only one president owns what is currently unfolding in Afghanistan::: and it’s the one bunkered down in Camp David right now.

He plotted his own course::: he chose the timetable::: he green lighted the strategy. He has been woefully wrong every step of the way and now has created one of the most disastrous foreign policy situations in American history.

There’s a lot of blame to go around for what has happened in Afghanistan over the last two decades::: but there’s only one administration to blame for what has unfolded over the last two months and especially the last two days.

Greed set the conditions that frame this "failure". Let's remember the original objective - to eliminate the Al Queda threat in Afghanistan::: which was achieved shortly after Tora Bora. Adding on requirements for "Westernizing" an agrarian society that embraced Sharia Law made this outcome inevitable. We started macro wars with elements who supported the Taliban ouster by enforcing western policies and sensibilities - See Haqqani. You can argue that a strong central government would theoretically prevent Afghanistan from becoming a terrorist safe haven again::: but never in its history has a centrally-gover
ned Afghanistan controlled the land or the people within its borders. The country is ruled valley by valley with regional strongmen. What we did instead guaranteed a protracted presence that enriched the Military Defense Industry::: whose benefactors donated millions to political campaigns. We witnessed legalized money laundering for 20 years across all administrations
. I find it hard to believe our intelligence mechanism didn't foresee a quick transition back to Taliban control::: when in fact we saw prominent Afghan leaders shuttling suitcases full of money out of the airport and to destinations like Qatar.

column5: I started at the U of M Flint in 1990. I was 40 years old and the same year my daughter started at the same school. I wanted to go to U of M Ann Arbor in 1968 for nursing when I graduated from high school but knew my parents couldn't afford it and I was brought up to believe you should never owe anyone anything. So that summer I worked to pay for stuff::: quilts for my dorm bed::: suitcases to go back and forth from home and a clock radio to keep on time. Those helped me at Hurley Hospital School of Nursing all 3 years I was there. My dad paid for my first year and I paid for the rest because I worked every summer and when I could for pay at the hospital::: evenings and nights::: as a nursing assistant. I had to take the equivalent to state nursing boards again just to get into the U of M nursing program after almost 30 years of practicing nursing to pass out of basic nursing and nutrition classes. I didn't learn a whole lot in the 5 yrs I went there after working all day I didn't already know except a lot of theory. So it really didn't make me a better nurse. It just made more money for the university.

Example is that with the flu shot there are people who haven't had the flu shot in 10 15 years maybe longer and never get the flu they're people that get the flu shot every year and get sick every year.. column18:
ME: CDC::: should I get poke if I already had Covid?

CDC: “Yes::: you should be poked regardless of whether you already had COVID-19. That’s because experts do not yet know how long you are protected from getting sick again after recovering from COVID-19.”

ME: Oh::: okay::: we don’t know how long natural immunity lasts. Got it. So::: how long does poke-induced immunity last?

CDC: “There is still a lot we are learning about COVID-19 pokes and CDC is constantly reviewing evidence and updating guidance. We don’t know how long protection lasts for those who are poked.”

ME: Okay … but wait a second. I thought you said the reason I need the poke was because we don’t know how long my natural immunity lasts::: but it seems like you’re saying we ALSO don’t know how long poke immunity lasts either. So::: how exactly is the poke immunity better than my natural immunity?

CDC: …

ME: Uh … alright. But::: haven’t there been a bunch of studies suggesting that natural immunity could last for years or decades?

CDC: Yes.

NEWYORKTIMES: “Years::: maybe even decades::: according to a new study.”

ME: Ah. So natural immunity might last longer than poke immunity?

CDC: Possibly. You never know.

ME: Okay. If I get the poke::: does that mean I won’t get sick?

BRITAIN: Nope. We are just now entering a seasonal spike and about half of our infections and hospital admissions are poked people.

ME: CDC::: is this true? Are there a lot of people in the U.S. catching Covid after getting the poke?

CDC: We stopped tracking breakthrough cases. We accept voluntary reports of breakthroughs but aren’t out there looking for them.

ME: Does that mean that if someone comes in the hospital with Covid::: you don’t track them because they’ve been poked? You only track the UN-poked Covid cases?

CDC: That’s right.

ME: Oh::: okay. Hmm. Well::: if I can still get sick after I get the poke::: how is it helping me?

CDC: We never said you wouldn’t get sick. We said it would reduce your chances of serious illness or death.

ME: Oh::: sorry. Alright::: exactly how much does it reduce my chance of serious illness or death.

CDC: We don’t know “exactly.”

ME: Oh. Then what’s your best estimate for how much risk reduction there is?

CDC: We don’t know::: okay? Next question.

ME: Um::: if I’m healthy and don’t want the poke::: is there any reason I should get it?

CDC: Yes::: for the collective.

ME: How does the collective benefit from me getting poked?

CDC: Because you could spread the virus to someone else who might get sick and die.

ME: Can a poked person spread the virus to someone else?

CDC: Yes.

ME: So if I get poked::: I could still spread the virus to someone else?

CDC: Yes.

ME: But I thought you just said::: the REASON I should get poked was to prevent me spreading the virus? How does that make sense if I can still catch Covid and spread it after getting the poke?

CDC: Never mind that. The other thing is::: if you stay unpoked::: there’s a chance the virus could possibly mutate into a strain that escapes the pokes protection::: putting all poked people at risk.

ME: So the poke stops the virus from mutating?

CDC: No.

ME: So it can still mutate in poked people?

CDC: Yes.

ME: This seems confusing. If the poke doesn’t stop mutations::: and it doesn’t stop infections::: then how does me getting poked help prevent a more deadly strain from evolving to escape the poke?

CDC: You aren’t listening::: okay? The bottom line is: as long as you are unpoked::: you pose a threat to poked people.

ME: But what KIND of threat??

CDC: The threat that they could get a serious case of Covid and possibly die.

ME: My brain hurts. Didn’t you JUST say that the poke doesn’t keep people from catching Covid::: but prevents a serious case or dying? Now it seems like you’re saying poked people can still easily die from Covid even after they got the poke just by running into an unpoked person! Which is it??

CDC: That’s it::: we’re hanging up now.

ME: Wait! I just want to make sure I understand all this. So::: even if I ALREADY had Covid::: I should STILL get poked::: because we don’t know how long natural immunity lasts::: and we also don’t know how long poke immunity lasts. And I should get the poke to keep a poked person from catching Covid from me::: but even if I get the poke::: I can give it to the poked person anyways. And::: the other poked person can still easily catch a serious case of Covid from me and die. Do I have all that right?

…

ME: Um::: hello? Is anyone there?

Copied and pasted.

column1: Human trafficking involves the use of force::: fraud::: or coercion to obtain some type of labor or commercial sex act. It happens in every country::: including the United States. This video::: created by the University of Michigan Human Trafficking Collaborative::: shares the compelling stories of survivors. Learn more at HumanTrafficking.UMich.edu
column3: I am glad to see that the university is getting involved in making people aware of human trafficking. It is a huge issue.
column4:
Wow::: this is an incredibly important collaborative. It brought me to tears reminding of me of a situation i encountered about three years ago…

One winter::: I spotted signs that popped up all over busy intersections in Westland::: MI that were suspicious because they had looked exactly like the types of signs I had previously learned were often used to ensnare victims of labor and/or sex trafficking.
The suspect road signs offered a non-descript job paying a lot of weekly cash::: with only a number to call with a woman’s name to ask for.

I take pictures of the signs::: drive around the Westland area to see what intersections they were at::: noted them and then called the police to file a report using the non-emergency line for the front desk so i could talk to an officer directly.

I explain to him the signs::: locations and reasoning why i believe they could indicate trafficking. And he basically laughs in response literally asking “do you expect me to call the number to check and see?” I replied with yes because I was too scared using my own number to contact potential traffickers. He then proceeds to take the rest of my information and if memory serves::: leaves me with a case number for my report.

Completely unsatisfied and disbelieving anything would come of my report::: I find the US national human trafficking hotline. I call them and immediately identify myself as not being trafficked or in a related emergency but rather needing to report signs of trafficking from a safe location. And I reach a man who is far more empathetic and validating of my suspicions who takes down all the details of my situation… before unintentionally
breaking my heart by telling me there was nothing more they could do::: or that i could do::: and that them having the case number I created was about as much power I could give them to intervene or help I was capable of offering.

I have no idea what ultimately came of my reports::: but the signs did get taken down a few days later. I wanted to do it myself but was too scared to do it alone. But it taught me a powerful lesson in what our systems are really setup to support… and where the real help actually comes from.

This work is SO important.

I did warn you. “Air Balloon” By Lily Allen. “Sheezus” By Lily Allen. “It’s ‘Cause I Am” By Callista Clark. “Shut Up And Fish” By Maddie and Tae. “Blood In The Cut” By K.Flay. “Panda” By Desiigner. Hm. “E.T.” By Katy Perry ft. Kanye West. “Tehran Tokyo” By Sasy. “Purple Lamborghini” By Skrillex & Rick Ross. “Work B*tch” By Britney Spears. “The Real Slim Shady” By Eminem. I found that one initially hard but eventually realized it after returning to it later. “Mani Per Money” By Era Istrefi. “Lean” By Ashley All Day. “Build A B*tch” By Bella Poarch. “Free Mind” By Tash Sultana. “With Ur Love” By Cher Lloyd (2 different videos for this song). “Bulletproof” By La Roux. “The Hand That Feeds” By Nine Inch Nails. “Only” By Nine Inch Nails (think “bubbles”). (that was hard for me to realize). (the bubbles). “Deal With It” By Ashnikko. “2InYaSpine” By Trill T (Odessa::: Texas rap artist). “A Good Heart” By Elton John. “Wake Up Call” By Phil Collins (kind of hard…you really have to pay attention). “Las de la Intuicion” By Shakira. “Alien” By Die Antwoord. And::: finally::: um…”Some Girls” By Madonna. There. Easy enough. This is in no way about excluding anybody. Oh. And “Oh No” By Marina And The Diamonds. There. Okay::: fine. “Venus Fly” By Grimes feat. Janelle Monae. These are::: again::: examples that work. “She Wolf” By Shakira. Okay::: but just a few more. Really::: it’s a space hog. Uh. “Scream & Shout” By will.i.am featuring Britney Spears. “No Roots” By Alice Merton. “Stylo” By Gorillaz (hard…but basics tell the truth…and the timing). “Pumped Up Kicks” By Foster The People. “Zombies::: March!” By Gwar (actually kind of hard)::: “Everybody Does” By Brooke Candy::: “Focus” By Ariana Grande::: oh::: and Selena Gomez wants a “Boyfriend.” “Aerials” By System Of A Down. There. NO MORE. [X]. What? You have::: like::: the whole internet. Well::: you should. I don’t know about current restrictions wherever you are. Fine. “The Pretender” By Foo Fighters. “Die Another Day” By Madonna. “Killpop” By Slipknot. “Style” By Taylor Swift. “F***ing Young” By Tyler::: The Creator (specifically where he starts out on the rooftop like a TMNT and it ends in a combo video. Should be 6:30 or so in length). One more. I can feel it. Ug. “Intergalactic”
By Beastie Boys. DONE. What now? “Genie In A Bottle” By Dove Cameron/
Christina Aguilera. “Circus” By Britney Spears. “Who Owns My Heart” By Miley Cyrus. There. This is…just thing. “Froot” By Marina And The Diamonds. “The Killing Type” By Amanda Palmer. “Water” By Brad Paisley. “Blessed Up” By Wande (Remix::: feat. Lecrae::: Mike Todd). Please? Thank you. [X] (“Empire” By Shakira & “So’ 4 cose” By Mimmo Ammirato).

column1: Do you think you could accurately distinguish a gray wolf from a coyote? Some researchers have expressed concerns about using crowdsourcing to accurately identify animals::: but a study by U-M researchers puts that notion to rest. Through Michigan ZoomIN::: nearly 4:::000 citizen scientists accurately identified the creatures on the trail cams at a 97% success rate::: proving that when crowdsourcing is designed properly::: it can be an effective and efficient way to help scientists with animal identification. myumi.ch/Axkkd

column1:
Theresa Gougeon has had a frustrating past 18 months::: dealing with an antibiotic-resistant superbug and ovarian cancer treatments that have left her fearful to leave the house due to her immunocompromised condition. Exhausted from the constant “fight-flight-freeze mode:::” the University of Michigan Rogel Cancer Center suggested a virtual art therapy class. Through working with art therapist Sandra Drabant::: Gougeon has found a “medicine” that has put her in a much more comfortable place. myumi.ch/yK30j

HEALTHBLOG.UOFMHEALTH.ORG
When Art Therapy Goes Virtual

Thomas Moore::: professor emeritus in the University of Michigan Ecology and Evolutionary Biology DepartmentU::: has spent nearly seven decades studying periodical cicadas. column1: Growing up in Tulsa::: Oklahoma::: Scott Ellsworth::: lecturer at the University of Michigan College of Literature::: Science::: and the ArtsDepartment of Afroamerican and African studies::: always heard stories about a riot taking place in May 1921::: but never learned about it in a classroom. In 1975::: Ellsworth set out to unearth the mystery of what is now known as the Tulsa Massacre through mapping out the town and gaining the trust of survivors to tell their stories. Now::: 45 years later::: his new book "The Ground Breaking" shines a light on one of the country’s most hidden histories. myumi.ch/R5VNE
column3: Study and make money online 😎😎😎
column4:
We met Scott a few years ago when he was on Faculty at Camp Michigania. He did awesome presentations on Tulsa and Hemingway-whose
family cottage is across Walloon next to Puff’s cave. Scott was wonderful and that led us into his wonderful book Secret Game about the first interracial collegiate basketball game. So pleased to see his work help bring out the truth about Tulsa and hope that U of M realizes what a treasure he is as a historian and teacher.

column1: University of Michigan researchers have played a critical role in the successful start to the Dark Energy Spectroscopic Instrument::: or DESI. The DESI project is an international collaboration that aims to map the universe over the next five years and unravel the mysteries behind “dark energy.” To do so the instrument relies on 5:::000 fiber optic “eyes:::” developed by U-M students and technicians::: to capture images showing unique views of galaxy light. Learn more about the project ➡️ myumi.ch/pdPqv

column1: A collaboration between the Michigan State Youth Soccer Association (MSYSA) and the University of Michigan School of Public Health helped get teams back on the field with pandemic precautions in summer 2020 and during the spring 2021 surge of new COVID-19 cases. MSYSA serves more than 90:::000 kids ages 4 to 19 playing the sport across the state and approached U-M about helping them create a safe reopening plan. U-M experts compiled all of the available information and created a Return to Play Phased Activity Chart for MSYSA which outlines important details and protocols for teams::: coaches::: and parents. Individual clubs and teams across the state are now using this guidance to help them in their planning and as COVID-19 risk management strategies. Get the full story here: myumi.ch/ME5ql

Hundreds of universities — including the University of Notre Dame::: Brown::: Cornell::: Northeastern University::: New York’s State University (SUNY) and City University (CUNY) systems::: and many other colleges and universities throughout the country — have said they will require COVID vaccines for the upcoming fall semester.
Bur mandating Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) products violates federal law.
Kennedy informed Holloway that COVID vaccines::: which are EUA products and therefore by definition experimental::: cannot cannot be mandated. Under federal law::: individuals have the right to accept or refuse EUA products. “Under the Nuremberg Code::: no one may be coerced to participate in a medical experiment. Consent of the individual is absolutely essential.
The college and university mandates have sparked a new wave of voices in the health freedom movement::: as many college students are speaking out against mandating an experimental vaccine for a virus that has a 99.74% survival rate.
According to the CDC’s own medical and scientific data::: in the last four months::: more than 4:::000 deaths tied to COVID-19 vaccines were reported as opposed to 1:::500 total deaths in the previous ten years for all vaccines::: the statement pointed out.
Dr. Farella said that children are at statistically zero risk for COVID-19. The data shows that the survivability rate for COVID-19 patients under the age of 20 is 99.997 percent.

column9: Shut the Guinea Pig lab down now!
column10:
Cruel animal experiments fail for tinnitus
I’m asking you to end cruel and flawed tinnitus research done on guinea pigs in the laboratory of Susan Shore at the University of Michigan and focus only on human-based studies::: which are already a significant component of the Shore research.

Despite years of studying tinnitus in animal models::: there is still no effective treatment or clear understanding of its cause. Information obtained from animal experiments is misleading and insufficient::: particularly for this complex disorder which is impossible to effectively model in animals.

Electrophysiolo
gical analyses that compared human tinnitus with that induced in animals indicate that there are different physiological processes occurring between humans and animals. Additionally::: behavioral tests in animals show that not all animals develop tinnitus when exposed to the same tinnitus-induci
ng agent. [Eggermont. Front. Aging Neurosci.::: 14 November 2016]

Human-based research is the only way to understand tinnitus. At the Bionics Institute in Melbourne::: Australia::: researchers developed a novel::: non-invasive::: non-radioactive
imaging method using functional near-infrared spectroscopy (fNIRS) to study tinnitus. By comparing the scans of people with and without tinnitus and analyzing that data with machine learning::: scientists were not only able to detect tinnitus but could predict those with moderate vs. severe tinnitus with almost 90% accuracy. Human-based studies such as this hold the only potential to treat this disorder.

I urge NIDCD and UM to terminate the guinea pig studies::: which serve only to make animals suffer::: and devote research resources into the human studies already in progress.

There has never heen a better time to embrace non animal research through tech advancements::: the human brain and body is poles apart from a guinea pig so stop this nonsense and embrace change ::: modernise::: be a compassionate front runner for a better way without subjecting guinea pigs in this instance to horrific pain and suffering. It is not smart and sets a bad example for responsible research and is hindering progress for cures.

column1: A new generation of nontraditional math scholars is being inspired by the Marjorie Lee Browne Scholars Program at U-M to consider earning a PhD. The two-year program::: which admits four fully funded students per year::: is funded by a National Science Foundation Bridging Bridges grant::: a program that highlights mentoring and community building to enhance diversity in STEM fields. The grant aims to increase the number of students from historically underrepresented communities::: including students of color and students from disadvantaged socioeconomic backgrounds. myumi.ch/ov54n

column3:
Open-Letter to Joe Biden of USA.

Sir.
We will first commend you::: on your emergence as current President of United States of America. You are now more or less number one world leader. Your influence and authority extends to other nations; far beyond United States.

We therefore urge you to rule with the fear of Almighty God::: who has allowed you to occupy that exulted position for a while. For the whole world is His::: and the fullness thereof. For God looks down in the kingdoms of men; to pay everyone according to his deeds.

We are glad you spoke of being of the Catholic Christian Faith. It’s a welcome development. You are expected to study the bible and go to Church regularly. The founding fathers of America like George Washington and Abraham Lincolm::: trusted in Jehovah; and He saw them through.

In the books of Kings in the bible (1st and 2nd Kings)::: the LORD visited the kings of Israel and Judah::: at one time or the other. He blessed or dealt with them and their families individually; depending on whether they served God or not. Kings like David::: Josiah and Hezekiah::: served the true God::: and they were blessed. On the other hand::: evil kings like Jeroboam and Ahab arose. Years later::: God wiped them and their families::: out of the surface of the earth!

We urge you to emulate the God-fearing disposition of your immediate predecessor::: Donald Trump. He made remarkable achievements in pushing the Middle East peace process forward. Also::: he gave recognition to Jerusalem as eternal capital of Israel. He moved US embassy in Israel to Jerusalem; and encouraged many nations to follow suit. He fought terrorism and dictatorship around the world.

We would want you to beam your searchlight::: on the activities of dictators over the nations; especially in Nigeria. The Crux of the matter is that Nigeria has been ruled for years now::: by a succession of foreign impostors. These foreign nationals are being hired::: cloned::: and masked::: to impersonate the dead Nigerian ruler. We will be very glad if you collaborate with United Nations::: or International Community::: to carry out thorough investigations of what is happening in Nigeria::: and bring perpetrators to book::: without any sentiment attached. ICC is a toothless bulldog. Wanton destruction of lives and property::: tribalism::: and high level looting of the treasury::: are all hinged on the facts::: that nobody can be held responsible. Nigeria is in virtual state of anarchy::: where Fulanis are being used to kill people on daily basis; while our wicked rulers keep quiet.

When a hireling::: is lording over a sovereign nation in the name of governance::: it has far reaching consequences on the masses. Take for instance::: the killings going on across Nigeria by sponsored Fulanis. The person at the helm of affairs::: occupying Aso Rock doesn’t care. He knows that one day::: he will suddenly leave the place with or without a trace. His kinsmen from mostly Niger Republic::: are pouring into Nigeria to engage in terrorism::: armed robbery (sorry banditry)::: kidnapping::: and other heinous crimes::: with impunity. How long will international community continue in the conspiracy of silence? We appeal to the conscience of world leaders. We are entitled to self-defence::: as our dynamic Biafra leader::: Nnamdi Kanu and his colleagues::: are organizing Eastern Security Network (ESN).

We appeal you use your position as world leader::: coupled with your sound educational background::: to stop the wickedness going on in Nigeria::: for the sake of humanity. Everybody knows that President Joe Biden is alive and real. Your picture anywhere under different attires::: remain the same. Your identity can never be under suspicion. Your oval face is there; which looks like the shape of “paw paw” in Africa.

International Community has been dragging its foot to restore Biafra. Biafra has met all the requirements::: to be an independent nation from oppressive Nigeria. If former Soviet Union::: Yugoslava::: and other countries::: can be divided into many nations without a war; why won’t Biafra go? What you people see as ethnic groups in Nigeria::: are nations in Europe. United Nations have consulted with the Biafra leader Nnamdi Kanu::: and his colleagues a number of times to deliberate on Biafra issues. We want something concrete to come out of it. Let the UN facilitate the independence of Biafra. Fulani atrocities and lordship over our people::: are far worse than colonial rule. We want to be free from the clutches of the wicked.

The issue is that Nigerian Authorities have been spending fortunes to “settle” rulers of nations that matter; to scuttle Biafra bid. Nigeria is hell to our people. Agents of Satan are ruling over the country. This struggle started over fifty years ago; when millions of our people were massacred::: raped::: their property destroyed::: and bank accounts frozen::: by evil rulers in the country. No human being or devil can stop Biafra. Anybody talking about making Nigeria to remain one::: is a hypocrite who has vested interest in wickedness going on there::: in name of governance.

Donald Trump did the much he could::: to advance the cause of Biafra during his tenure. He tried as a human being. Other world rulers like: Putin of Russia::: Netanyahu of Israel::: and Emmanuel Macron of France::: are lending their support for the restoration of Biafra. However::: our greatest trust lies in Almighty God::: creator of the whole universe. He has the power to remove anybody from whatever position and replace him with whoever pleases Him.

We urge you to hold consultations with Biafran leader::: Nnamdi Kanu and his colleagues::: to find lasting solution to Biafra restoration.

God Almighty reigns in the kingdom of men. If you observe carefully::: you will notice He is dealing with wicked rulers::: and their surrogates in Nigeria. He has taken away many of them out of this world::: since the middle of the year 2020. People are running away from Aso Rock for fear of mysterious deaths. God Almighty will judge any nation or individual::: that gangs up against Biafran people; no matter how highly placed. On the other hand::: He will bless nations and individuals::: who support and work toward Biafra independence::: from Nigerian slavery.

We are eagerly waiting for your swift positive response. Let not United Nations wait for the situation to degenerate into another genocide::: and full scale civil war before intervening. For our Biafran leader and his team are highly determined to defend our land. Let them not think they can repeat the atrocities they committed during the civil war; when millions of our people mostly civilians were massacred. They should know that if they start another war::: it will reach all parts of the country.

God said::: “Fret not yourself because of evildoers::: neither be thou envious against the workers of iniquity. For they shall soon be cut down like the grass::: and wither as the green herb. For evildoers shall be cut off::: but those that wait upon the LORD::: they shall inherit the earth. For yet a little while::: and the wicked shall not be: yea::: thou shall diligently consider his place::: and it shall not be.

“The wicked plots against the just and gnashes upon him with his teeth. The LORD shall laugh at him; for he sees that his day is coming. The wicked have bent their bow::: to cast down the poor and needy::: and to slay such as be of upright conversation. Their sword shall enter into their own hearts::: and there bows shall be broken.

“I have seen the wicked in great power::: and spreading himself like a green bay tree. Yet he passed away::: and lo he was not; yea I sought him::: but he could not be found. Mark the perfect man::: and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace. But the transgressor shall be destroyed together the end of the wicked shall be cut off”—Psalms 37.

I will write you again in due course.
Yours Sincerely:::
Evangelist Joseph U. Afurobi.

Mott Children’s to check the weight of her 1 year old son Re’mon::: who was diagnosed with a rare genetic condition that made eating difficult. However when #COVID19 forced the clinics to shut down::: Cleveland and many other parents were left with few options to access a simple health care need like the specialized scales used at the clinic. column1:
Questions about the COVID-19 Vaccines?

Are you or a loved one undecided about getting a COVID-19 vaccine? Two Michigan Medicine experts will provide accurate information to help during a live Q&A::: Wednesday April 28 at 4 p.m.

The event features:
Dr. Diane Harper of the Department of Family Medicine and the Center for Disability Health & Wellness::: who has studied vaccination issues and preventive care guidelines

Dr. Payal Patel of the Division of Infectious Diseases in the Department of Internal Medicine::: and the VA Ann Arbor Healthcare System::: who studies infection prevention and was one of the first U-M employees to be vaccinated

Post your questions in the comments on the live feed on the Michigan Medicine YouTube::: Facebook or Twitter channel. Or email them to ask-michmed@med.umich.edu.

"The vaccines met FDA’s rigorous scientific standards for safety::: effectiveness::: and manufacturing quality needed to support emergency use authorization:::"
the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention states on its website.

FDA approval of a drug::: which requires a rigorous and structured process::: means that data on the drug’s effects have been reviewed by the Center for Drug Evaluation and Research::: which rules on whether the drug's provided benefits "outweigh its known and potential risks for the intended population:::" according to the agency's website.

column4:
Open-Letter to Joe Biden of USA.

Sir.
We will first commend you::: on your emergence as current President of United States of America. You are now more or less number one world leader. Your influence and authority extends to other nations; far beyond United States.

We therefore urge you to rule with the fear of Almighty God::: who has allowed you to occupy that exulted position for a while. For the whole world is His::: and the fullness thereof. For God looks down in the kingdoms of men; to pay everyone according to his deeds.

We are glad you spoke of being of the Catholic Christian Faith. It’s a welcome development. You are expected to study the bible and go to Church regularly. The founding fathers of America like George Washington and Abraham Lincolm::: trusted in Jehovah; and He saw them through.

In the books of Kings in the bible (1st and 2nd Kings)::: the LORD visited the kings of Israel and Judah::: at one time or the other. He blessed or dealt with them and their families individually; depending on whether they served God or not. Kings like David::: Josiah and Hezekiah::: served the true God::: and they were blessed. On the other hand::: evil kings like Jeroboam and Ahab arose. Years later::: God wiped them and their families::: out of the surface of the earth!

We urge you to emulate the God-fearing disposition of your immediate predecessor::: Donald Trump. He made remarkable achievements in pushing the Middle East peace process forward. Also::: he gave recognition to Jerusalem as eternal capital of Israel. He moved US embassy in Israel to Jerusalem; and encouraged many nations to follow suit. He fought terrorism and dictatorship around the world.

We would want you to beam your searchlight::: on the activities of dictators over the nations; especially in Nigeria. The Crux of the matter is that Nigeria has been ruled for years now::: by a succession of foreign impostors. These foreign nationals are being hired::: cloned::: and masked::: to impersonate the dead Nigerian ruler. We will be very glad if you collaborate with United Nations::: or International Community::: to carry out thorough investigations of what is happening in Nigeria::: and bring perpetrators to book::: without any sentiment attached. ICC is a toothless bulldog. Wanton destruction of lives and property::: tribalism::: and high level looting of the treasury::: are all hinged on the facts::: that nobody can be held responsible. Nigeria is in virtual state of anarchy::: where Fulanis are being used to kill people on daily basis; while our wicked rulers keep quiet.

When a hireling::: is lording over a sovereign nation in the name of governance::: it has far reaching consequences on the masses. Take for instance::: the killings going on across Nigeria by sponsored Fulanis. The person at the helm of affairs::: occupying Aso Rock doesn’t care. He knows that one day::: he will suddenly leave the place with or without a trace. His kinsmen from mostly Niger Republic::: are pouring into Nigeria to engage in terrorism::: armed robbery (sorry banditry)::: kidnapping::: and other heinous crimes::: with impunity. How long will international community continue in the conspiracy of silence? We appeal to the conscience of world leaders. We are entitled to self-defence::: as our dynamic Biafra leader::: Nnamdi Kanu and his colleagues::: are organizing Eastern Security Network (ESN).

We appeal you use your position as world leader::: coupled with your sound educational background::: to stop the wickedness going on in Nigeria::: for the sake of humanity. Everybody knows that President Joe Biden is alive and real. Your picture anywhere under different attires::: remain the same. Your identity can never be under suspicion. Your oval face is there; which looks like the shape of “paw paw” in Africa.

International Community has been dragging its foot to restore Biafra. Biafra has met all the requirements::: to be an independent nation from oppressive Nigeria. If former Soviet Union::: Yugoslava::: and other countries::: can be divided into many nations without a war; why won’t Biafra go? What you people see as ethnic groups in Nigeria::: are nations in Europe. United Nations have consulted with the Biafra leader Nnamdi Kanu::: and his colleagues a number of times to deliberate on Biafra issues. We want something concrete to come out of it. Let the UN facilitate the independence of Biafra. Fulani atrocities and lordship over our people::: are far worse than colonial rule. We want to be free from the clutches of the wicked.

The issue is that Nigerian Authorities have been spending fortunes to “settle” rulers of nations that matter; to scuttle Biafra bid. Nigeria is hell to our people. Agents of Satan are ruling over the country. This struggle started over fifty years ago; when millions of our people were massacred::: raped::: their property destroyed::: and bank accounts frozen::: by evil rulers in the country. No human being or devil can stop Biafra. Anybody talking about making Nigeria to remain one::: is a hypocrite who has vested interest in wickedness going on there::: in name of governance.

Donald Trump did the much he could::: to advance the cause of Biafra during his tenure. He tried as a human being. Other world rulers like: Putin of Russia::: Netanyahu of Israel::: and Emmanuel Macron of France::: are lending their support for the restoration of Biafra. However::: our greatest trust lies in Almighty God::: creator of the whole universe. He has the power to remove anybody from whatever position and replace him with whoever pleases Him.

We urge you to hold consultations with Biafran leader::: Nnamdi Kanu and his colleagues::: to find lasting solution to Biafra restoration.

God Almighty reigns in the kingdom of men. If you observe carefully::: you will notice He is dealing with wicked rulers::: and their surrogates in Nigeria. He has taken away many of them out of this world::: since the middle of the year 2020. People are running away from Aso Rock for fear of mysterious deaths. God Almighty will judge any nation or individual::: that gangs up against Biafran people; no matter how highly placed. On the other hand::: He will bless nations and individuals::: who support and work toward Biafra independence::: from Nigerian slavery.

We are eagerly waiting for your swift positive response. Let not United Nations wait for the situation to degenerate into another genocide::: and full scale civil war before intervening. For our Biafran leader and his team are highly determined to defend our land. Let them not think they can repeat the atrocities they committed during the civil war; when millions of our people mostly civilians were massacred. They should know that if they start another war::: it will reach all parts of the country.

God said::: “Fret not yourself because of evildoers::: neither be thou envious against the workers of iniquity. For they shall soon be cut down like the grass::: and wither as the green herb. For evildoers shall be cut off::: but those that wait upon the LORD::: they shall inherit the earth. For yet a little while::: and the wicked shall not be: yea::: thou shall diligently consider his place::: and it shall not be.

“The wicked plots against the just and gnashes upon him with his teeth. The LORD shall laugh at him; for he sees that his day is coming. The wicked have bent their bow::: to cast down the poor and needy::: and to slay such as be of upright conversation. Their sword shall enter into their own hearts::: and there bows shall be broken.

“I have seen the wicked in great power::: and spreading himself like a green bay tree. Yet he passed away::: and lo he was not; yea I sought him::: but he could not be found. Mark the perfect man::: and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace. But the transgressor shall be destroyed together the end of the wicked shall be cut off”—Psalms 37.

I will write you again in due course.
Yours Sincerely:::
Evangelist Joseph U. Afurobi.

column3: I thought after getting married to my man everything would be smooth for us and nothing would ever come between us but I was wrong and now I know any relationship needs trust :::faith love :::hope and fighting for the one person your heart truly loves. I got married with my man last year and things between us were fine and we were so happy and so much in love and we did everything together as a married couple.We went to dinners and movies together. Then one day as I was cleaning my husband clothes::: I found a piece of paper with a phone number on it and love message. My heart skipped for a moment and I knew there and then that my man was cheating on me. I kept quiet and didn't say anything to him::: I called mama Adamz and told her my problem because mama had helped my friend with her boyfriend who was cheating on her too. Mama made a love and binding spiritual prayer for me and in 1 day of the prayers my husband came home early and sat me down and confessed everything about the other woman and told me they had not gone far and his sorry for hurting me and not respecting our marriage and begged for my forgiveness and promised never to hurt me again or see that woman ever again. I forgave my man and he is back to the same man i used to know and he loves me so much now and we do everything as a couple with our daughter. I came back home the next day from work and he had decorated our bedroom with love pillows and candle lights and roses::: it was so lovely. Thanks so much mama Adamz your prayers really work. For you all that may be going through the same situation::: please don't hesitate to call or whats-app mama Adamz on +256785800158. she will be of great help to you.

Stream with Charles Woodson on Giving Blueday 2021

Charles Woodson has always had a passion to make a difference for sick children. More than a decade ago::: he established the Charles Woodson Clinical Research Fund at Michigan Medicine C.S. Mott Children Hospital to improve knowledge::: treatments::: and care for a wide range of pediatric illnesses.

For Giving Blueday 2021::: Charles talked with Melissa Cousino::: Ph.D.::: and Gabe Owens::: M.D.::: Ph.D.::: to hear about the exciting research and progress they have been able to make thanks to the support they received from generous Woodson Fund donors.

Join Charles::: Dr. Cousino::: and Dr. Owens on March 10::: 2021::: to celebrate Giving Blueday::: the University of Michigan’s annual day of philanthropy. Show your support for the Woodson Fund at victors.us/WoodsonGBD2021 — every contribution makes a meaningful impact for children and families all over the world.

column3:
Why is the COVID vaccine controversial?
This vaccine is different::: the first of it’s kind. It is an MRNA vaccine.
“It delivers genetic information to parts of your body::: usually in order to overwrite or erase the genetic information that’s already there. “It uses a sequence of genetic RNA material produced in a lab that::: when injected into your body::: must invade your cells and hijack your cells’ protein-making machinery called ribosomes to produce the viral components that subsequently train your immune system to fight the virus.” …There are unique and unknown risks to messenger RNA vaccines::: including local and systemic inflammatory responses that could lead to autoimmune conditions.
Soo……..genetic RNA… invade your cells…. hijack your cells’ ….”There are unique and unknown risks to messenger RNA vaccines::: including local and systemic inflammatory responses that could lead to autoimmune conditions.”
History:….mRNA vaccines have been in trials over the last 10 years::: but were unable to pass the animal studies. However::: Under this Emergency act::: animal studies were waived. According to the FDA website::: the COVID-19 only has emergency approval only. A Pfeizer phase 3 randomized and placebo-control
led trial using BNT162b2 in approximately 44:::000 participants) https://
www.fda.gov/
emergency-prepar
edness-and-resp
onse
Between Dec. 14::: 2020 and Feb. 4::: 2021.: (less than 2 months)
12:::697 total adverse events of which were 653 deaths — (145 Bell’s Palsy) — had been reported to Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System (VAERS) following COVID-19 vaccinations.
Reactions include: persistant malaise::: extreme exhaustion::: anaphylactic reactions::: Multi-system inflammatory syndrome::: chronic seizures and convulsions::: Bell’s palsy::: paralysis::: sudden death within hours or days.
Adverse effect during trials included: multiple sclerosis::: myalgic encephalomyelit
is::: Inflammation of the brain and the spinal cord …”
Chinese health experts have called on Norway and other countries to suspend the use of the Pfizer CoVID -19 vaccines. The reason for the deaths of 23 elderly Norwegians connected to the safety of the vaccines. Jan 16 2021 www.medindia.ne
t

vitamin C (ascorbic acid) and vitamin D both have an enormous amount of research showing they provide important immune function enhancements::: and that your immune function is your frontline defense against all illness::: including COVID-19.Landma
rk Publication on Vitamin C for COVID-19 | Soren Dreier
Journal of Endocrinologica
l Investigation found an association between vitamin D deficiencies and higher mortality risks from COVID-19…..
"What we've seen is that the virus might actually be making use of that deficit:::” McKoy says…. Zinc is another nutrient that plays an important role in immune function::: especially with regard to the production of white blood cells::: which help to fight off infections. “The worse your infection::: the higher your white blood cell numbers go up. And so if your zinc levels are low or insufficient::: you won't have sufficient white cells to fight your infection:::” McKoy says. aarp

column5:
Lynn Carpenter::: I read about your project in the M University Record and find it extraordinary. I would like to recommend::: however::: a change of lexicon when referring to the summer of 1967 in Detroit. I went to a Detroit Historical Museum 50 year anniversary exhibition about the events and that made me reflect on the different perspectives we Detroiters-\-\Bla
ck and White::: urban and suburban-\-\have of that historic violence. I was 15 y.o. White girl living in Oak Park near 8 Mile Rd that summer; we always called it the 1967 Riots. But when you learn about how it all came about you start to understand the historical complexity of police-communit
y relations. Since seeing this exhibit at the DHM I no longer use the word "riot"-\-\that word when used to refer to violent events in Black communities and neighborhoods really means violence AGAINST Black people (Think Tulsa...). Perhaps you can change the conversation through your photos and language. https://
detroithistorica
l.org/learn/
encyclopedia-of-
detroit/
uprising-1967

column1:
After nearly a year of change and uncertainty::: U-M's Counseling and Psychological Services (CAPS) Associate Director of Community Outreach and Engagement::: Dr. Christine Asidao::: shares methods to help students care for their mental health and personal well-being during Winter 2021.

caps.umich.edu
column3:
Some great advice from Dr. Christine Asidao. Check in with yourself and try to be physically active seems be important. Another way you may be able to improve mental health is by helping others. One way you can easily help others is by tutoring online. There is a new site called tutorshares.com
. It's a free and open platform for Students::: Tutors and Parents to connect globally.
There are no fees nor any transaction costs on the site. It's purely made so that Students and Parents can find the right Tutor.
The idea of the platform is to make the whole tutoring process free and open. The payment method is also up to the Student::: Tutor or Parent to decide as the transaction will be made directly between the Student::: Tutor or Parent. You can volunteer if you want to help students in need of help also.
Join tutorshares.com and be part of a new and growing free and open community of Students::: Tutors and Parents globally!

column142: For me::: it was the last Ann Arbor Public Schools' Orchestra Night in early March::: 2020. It nearly didn't happen: Snow interfered with the original date; miraculously::: I'd say::: the concert was able to be rescheduled::: and it was stunning. In my opinion::: the highlight was the Huron High School Symphony's performance of the 1812 Overture::: using alumni as the needed extras::: and using garbage cans for the cannons. I had a number of violin and viola students in the orchestra::: and I was just thrilled with what they were able to pull off! There can be no such concert this academic year::: and I guess it remains to be seen what can happen in subsequent years.

I've been asking for people to share my facebook posts especially the ones from today::: because I really need them to go viral & be seen by large amounts of people at or around the same time...but people frequently ignore my requests.

U of M & other medical facilities NEED to STOP giving medications & start actually TREATING the underlying CAUSES for symptoms of depression etc and mental illnesses!!

It is my opinion or knowledge I should say::: really::: that they need to begin having people who come in for help in the psychiatric hospital or are inpatients listen to these binaural beats.

Have them meditate & Do yoga. Music therapy. Eating healthier & less meat.

In my opinion Delonis & other places that impact the homeless community greatly needs to enact a change in their menu to provide better food that has better nutritional value.

If you feed people a steak::: vs giving them avocado. There is a difference in the affect that meal will have.

Food and nutrition is one of the top things that can affect someone either positively or negatively.

The food you eat::: how it is prepared::: etc. That all matters and can affect MOODS of a human being in negative or positive ways.

These hospitals and doctors need to encourage those suffering or struggling with mental "illness" to do healthy things like writing in journals. Art therapy. Incense & aromatherapy.

Use what is enjoyable & calming & soothing to assist these people.

Delonis could benefit people a lot from using soothing::: soft music playing there::: like this video I sent to you.

Aromatherapy would be very helpful and beneficial there::: like a diffuser with essential oils.

Letting people do art on a regular basis and having access to art supplies at any time.

Things tha
t provide healthy & natural outlets for stress::: grief::: emotional issues..

They need to start actually MEETING the peoples health needs and spiritual care is super important to those who suffer from mental "illness".

Meds cure nothing at all. They don't even frequently help people cope! It is such a waste.

These issues that they "treat" with pills can be SOLVED if they TREAT them properly & adequately!

No more fucking BANDAIDS to this issue!!

There is a CURE FOR MENTAL ILLNESSES.

I'VE EXPERIENCED IT MYSELF MANY TIMES.

After being traumatized victimized terrorized demonized.....r
e traumatized over and over again...

These HEAL & help recovery of parts of the brain that are or have been damaged by things like trauma and conditioning.

And I know that without a doubt they work.

Many of these doctors know it too but they are pushed & pressured to diagnose::: prescribe & over prescribe.

Many of them fall victim to the pressure of those who are deemed or seen as being "higher up" or "more powerful" than they are & they crumble under the weight & pressure & succumb to it.

This also needs to STOP. It is causing damaging effects to all walks of life and all people. Across the board::: it is.

I say. Remove the vs. And shake hands across that line. If everyone just removes the vs between them. There is no more DIVISION there will only then be unity the main thing it takes is communication and understanding.

A commitment to do what's right & best bc I really do not think anyone enjoys doing wrong or bad.

Pills & medications are not the answer to most of these situations.

Doctors need to stop covering for hospitals and hospitals need to stop covering for doctors too.

This is super important.

Of course my mind is always on the issues and how we can solve them.

I hope to see & experience a world without issues!

Happy New Year To You::: Lauren!

Blessings To You & To Your Family & To Your Friends & To Everyone!

Stop pushing PILLS and give people REAL RELIEF FROM THE ISSUES THEY SUFFER FROM!!!!!!!!

U OF M COULD BE THE POSTER CHILD FOR A NEW WAY OF TREATING AND DEALING WITH MENTAL ILLNESS.

FOCUS AND PUT YOUR HEART AND HANDS TO WORK FOR THE BENEFIT AND GOOD OF ALL PEOPLE!!!!!!!!

column15:
People...Vitami
n D levels are key to proper immune system function. A large % of people dying or ending up in the ICU for C-19 are Vitamin D deficient.

Dark skin doesn’t allow the absorption of the spectrum of sunlight which generates endogenous Vitamin D production as well as in light skinned people. One of the easiest and best things everyone should be doing is getting enough sunlight exposure and/
or Vitamin D supplementation. This is also part of the reason in the northern hemisphere every year we see “flu season” since there is generally less sunlight and hence drops in Vitamin D levels.

Quit arguing about wearing masks (which the way they are used in public do little to nothing)::: and start learning how to make your immune system stronger since humans have been battling viruses since the beginning of time. 😌✌🏻

column91:
I’ve seen covid-19 compared to the 1918 plague many times. But the numbers are Skewed.

The population back in 1918 was only 1.8 billion. Our current population is over 7.6 billion. So when you adjust the death rates in 1918::: which was 50 million estimated. Then take our population in 2020. Adjust for the population differences with simple math. You will find out::: That plague would kill over 200 million plus in 2020.

Obviously::: measures to contain said plague::: were different back then. So was our medical knowledge and technology. But thats a debate for another time.

We are currently standing At 1.61 million dead world wide. The 1918 Plague lasted 2 years. If you do the math. COVID-19 will not reach 50 million dead in two years.

That is the number that died back in the 1918-1920 plague::: Let alone the adjusted death number’s for the population difference. The survival rate for Covid-19 is also incredibly high. Far higher then the 1918-1920 plague was::: with a much smaller population.

Again if you adjust for the population difference::: that plague from 1918 would have a 89.45% survival rate in 2020 with the difference in population.

That is the rough mathematical calculation with given information via the internet. With cross referencing to try and get accurate numbers.

Instead of just blindly listening to others or the media::: I choose to research on my own. This is what I came up with. So now I have to say it. Why on earth are we panicking.

I know it exists and I know it can be deadly. But our response does not match the numbers. Our response is extreme::: almost like it had a 50% death rate. Which if it did::: I would say we need the extreme!

But numbers do not lie unless the numbers were wrong in the first place. Everything was found on the internet with current information that is available to everyone.

A virtual discussion about the COVID-19 vaccine development and approval process was held on December 2 with infectious disease expert and University of Michigan School of Public Health professor Arnold Monto. Here are some key takeaways from the virtual discussion. myumi.ch/jx89d

column7:
Remember H1N1? Here’s a timeline regarding how fast the H1N1 vaccination was rolled out:

April 17::: 2009: A new H1N1 virus is detected in the U.S.

CDC begins working to develop a virus (called a candidate vaccine virus) that could be used to make vaccine to protect against this new virus.

April 25::: 2009: The World Health Organization (WHO) declares a public health emergency of international concern.

June 11::: 2009: WHO officially declares the new 2009 H1N1 outbreak a pandemic.

October 5::: 2009: The first doses of monovalent H1N1 pandemic vaccine are administered.

August 10::: 2010: WHO declares an end to 2009 H1N1 influenza pandemic.

column24:
Listening to this I am glad to be volunteering and will be first in line - well::: we will have 1-2 months before I am allowed! I had all the diseases like measles::: mumps - and still have high antibody titers - and in principle trust natural immunity more. But COVID-19 has made many people suffer for months - even if the fatality rate is only 0.5%::: the morbidity - of people having symptoms that makes them often unable to work is up to 40% - that is decidedly different and much worse than flu - even if the mortality may soon be similar (if we all could get the VIP treatment that Christie::: Trump::: Giuliani and Carson got.

The cases of transverse myelitis were with the AZ vaccine::: which is only 62% effective::: maybe 70% as they claim. For that vaccine::: I would also rather wait. That was not a side effect in Moderna or Pfizer vaccines.

I am willing to take a 4/20:::000 chance of Bell's palsy if that is true over getting COVID19

column1: Held on the first weekend of December::: Galens Tag Days has become an Ann Arbor tradition since 1927. Each year::: Galens members don red ponchos::: grab metal buckets::: and take to the streets of Ann Arbor to collect monetary donations to support children’s charities of Washtenaw County. 100% of proceeds go directly to local charities that provide educational resources::: medical care::: and special needs assistance to local children. Photo circa 1959 myumi.ch/7Z9AO

Understanding Quality of Life for Caregivers of Persons with Traumatic Brain Injury
column3:
Dr Margarite Griesz-Brisson MD PhD is a leading European neurologist and
neurophysiologi
st. In October 2020::: she warned that rebreathing our exhaled air::: because of
wearing masks::: will create oxygen deficiency and an excess of carbon dioxide in the body.
‘We know:::’ she said::: ‘that the human brain is very sensitive to oxygen deprivation. There are
nerve cells in the hippocampus that cannot last longer than three minutes without oxygen.’ Dr
Griesz-Brisson pointed out that the acute warning symptoms of oxygen deprivation are
headaches::: drowsiness::: dizziness::: difficulty in concentration and slowing down of reaction
times. The real danger is::: however::: that when the oxygen deprivation becomes chronic::: the
symptoms disappear because the body gets used to them. However::: efficiency remains
impaired and the damage to the brain continues. ‘
Children and teenagers must never wear masks:::
partly because they have extremely active and adaptive immune systems but also because
their brains are especially active and vulnerable. The more active an organ is the more
oxygen it needs. And so the damage to children’s brains is huge and irreversible.
She warns that dementia is going to increase in ten years::: and the younger generation will
not be able to reach their potential because of the mask wearing.
Oxygen deprivation adversely affects the heart and the lungs but it also damages the brain.
And the damage will be permanent. ‘My conclusion has to be that no one has the right to force us to deprive our bodies of
oxygen for absolutely no good reason. Depriving individuals of oxygen is a crime perpetrated
by those demanding that we wear masks. Those who let it happen and those who collaborate
are also guilty

column5: I don't have a family or anyone likely to invite me to an in-home gathering of any sort. For the past 20 years I've spent Thanksgiving in a restaurant first with my mother and Betty::: then just with Betty. The past three years I brought takeout to Betty's bedside. I take some calculated risks not to spend too much time alone in my apartment. I consider (for myself) having to spend Thanksgiving alone a fate worse than death so I made a date to meet a friend at a restaurant. We will most likely eat indoors because it's raining. This will be the first and probably the last time I eat indoors at a restaurant. My friend has a COVID test every week because she works at an assisted living facility. The inside of this restaurant has a perimeter of tables where there are not tables next to each other horizontally (hard to describe) so I will be facing my friend but other people will have their backs to our backs.

column127: Unfortunately::: there is a lot of misconception on this topic. A significant part of the reason it takes less time is that it's not a traditional vaccine. It's not the virus or a dead virus even. It's a messenger RNA. Which::: by its nature::: takes less time to create. It will be the new normal. An mRNA vaccine inserts fragments of viral mRNA into human cells::: reprogrammed to produce pathogen antigens::: which then stimulate an adaptive immune response against the pathogen. This is the future. It just happens to be the first widespread use of this type of vaccine.

column14: This is fabulous news! My father was the first person to survive a new rigorous protocol that came out of U of M research in 1984. This was over 30 years ago. He was originally told::: “Go home and get your affairs in order - you’ve got about 6 weeks.” Two weeks later he was accepted into the new treatment “test case”. Did he have some unfortunate side effects? Yes! Would he have traded the 30 years and 8 months he lived after that initial expectation for 6 mos of relative comfort? NO. The treatment definitely was worth the gamble::: and even though he had no active cancer when he died::: he did die of complications from cancer treatment. Would we::: as a family::: do it again? In a heartbeat!

column14:
It's hard to believe that Senate Democrats just voted AGAIN to block COVID relief. There are Americans who can't feed their families because of the economic side effects of COVID-19 shutdowns::: yet Democrats still refuse to act unless Republicans allow 2.4 trillion in irresponsible spending. The bill includes new money for small businesses::: schools::: health care systems and the unemployed.

I hope Americans are watching the Democrats as they once again block COVID relief from moving forward. Senate GOP has tried multiple times to pass a targeted::: fiscally responsible bill that would help Americans in need of *immediate* relief. Democrats have blocked every attempt.

House Speaker Nancy Pelosi on Wednesday downplayed chances of Congress passing a big new economic stimulus bill before the election::: even as Democrats voted to block a slimmed-down GOP relief measure in the Senate.

The vote in the Senate was 51-44 along party lines::: well short of the 60 votes that would have been needed to advance the approximately $500 billion measure. It was practically the same outcome as last month::: when Majority Leader Mitch McConnell (R-Ky.) tried to advance a nearly identical bill in the Senate.

Senate GOP leaders argued that their approximately $500 billion bill was the appropriate response::: and would have provided at least some help to needy Americans who’ve been waiting months for more relief from Congress as layoffs mount and coronavirus cases rise. The bill includes new money for small businesses::: schools::: health care systems and the unemployed.
